trans-unit.source: The user's home directory could not be determined. Set the '{0}' environment variable to specify the directory to use.
trans-unit.target: 無法判定該使用者的主目錄。請設定 '{0}' 環境變數，指定要使用的目錄。

trans-unit.source: ---------------- Explore documentation: https://aka.ms/dotnet-docs Report issues and find source on GitHub: https://github.com/dotnet/core Find out what's new: https://aka.ms/dotnet-whats-new Learn about the installed HTTPS developer cert: https://aka.ms/aspnet-core-https Use 'dotnet --help' to see available commands or visit: https://aka.ms/dotnet-cli-docs Write your first app: https://aka.ms/first-net-core-app --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
trans-unit.target: ---------------- Explore documentation: https://aka.ms/dotnet-docs Report issues and find source on GitHub: https://github.com/dotnet/core Find out what's new: https://aka.ms/dotnet-whats-new Learn about the installed HTTPS developer cert: https://aka.ms/aspnet-core-https Use 'dotnet --help' to see available commands or visit: https://aka.ms/dotnet-cli-docs Write your first app: https://aka.ms/first-net-core-app --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

trans-unit.source:
Telemetry --------- The .NET Core tools collect usage data in order to help us improve your experience. The data is anonymous. It is collected by Microsoft and shared with the community. You can opt-out of telemetry by setting the DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT environment variable to '1' or 'true' using your favorite shell.
Read more about .NET Core CLI Tools telemetry: https://aka.ms/dotnet-cli-telemetry
trans-unit.target:
遙測 --------- .NET Core 工具會收集使用方式資料以協助我們改善您的體驗。資料會匿名提供，由 Microsoft 收集並與社群共用。您可以使用偏好的殼層將 DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT 環境變數設為 '1' 或 'true'，來退出遙測。
閱讀關於 .NET Core CLI 工具遙測的更多內容: https://aka.ms/dotnet-cli-telemetry
